task.summary: Default task
src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx добавлен разворот состава работ в fullscreen dialog
src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx добавлен разворот комментариев в fullscreen dialog
src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx дублирующий заголовок у плитки «Комментарии» удален
src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx стиль текста в плитке "Геолокация" изменен на body1
/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/ добавлена возможность скачивания и удаления сметы
// app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx верска переделана на masonry с адаптивом
Добавлен компонент TasksLocation.tsx - карта задач для исполнителя
Добавлен поиск и фильтрация по задачам в TasksLocation.tsx
TasksLocation.tsx - изменен UI фильтрации и поиска
TasksLocation.tsx - блок фильтров под мобильный уменьшен: ширина 88vw
Добавлен переиспользуемый клиент сокетов с ленивой инициализацией и авторизацией в src/app/lib/socketClient.ts чтобы UI-компоненты могли использовать единое подключение Socket.IO.
Task comments now compress images client-side before upload. images are read into a canvas, resized down to max ~1600px with 0.75 JPEG quality
Comment thread now behaves like a messenger
Added server-side socket support for task comment rooms
fix build app error

Новая страница src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/locations/page.tsx рендерит ProjectTaskLocation NavigationMenu теперь подбирает ссылку “ГЕОЛОКАЦИИ” по роли: исполнители остаются на /tasks/locations, остальные роли идут на маршрут проекта
Added src/utils/statusLabels.ts with normalized status mapping, Russian labels, and shared order for consistent rendering.
fix build app error

Navigation now looks at profileType and loads managed projects for employers via /api/org + project lists; “Мои задачи” and “Геолокации” link to the selected managed project with a dropdown of project slugs when more than one is available (src/app/components/NavigationMenu.tsx)
fix build app error
fix build app error #2

Updated src/app/components/NavigationMenu.tsx to detect employers managing at least one project and replace the "МОИ ЗАДАЧИ" item with "МОИ ПРОЕКТЫ" for them; other users keep the existing tasks entry and ordering.
Task comments now respect dark mode: message bubbles, attachments, previews, and the input field pick dark-friendly backgrounds/borders via theme-aware styles in src/app/component /TaskComments.tsx

Added accept/reject controls with Apple-style styling to the info card and wired them to status updates via the task API. confirmation dialog now shows task name/BS/срок and applies. At work or To do after confirmation, with error handling. Path: src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx.

Buttons now show only for Assigned tasks and keep the Apple-style dialog; accept/reject still drive status changes via the dialog. Acceptance/ rejection events now record the real user name (not “Unknown”), and manager notifications are emitted through NotificationBell using a new task_status_change notification type (model and link mapping updated). Rejection continues to clear the executor; manager notifications include task info and status/decision.

Restricted task visibility for contractors: if the current user isn’t the assigned executor, the page now shows a warning and link back to the task list. Fetching user context now captures clerkUserId and profile type to enforce this. File: src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx

Strengthened contractor access control: we now normalize the current user ID from context (including fallback to user.id), and contractors are blocked if no executor is assigned or the executor ID doesn’t match them—showing the warning view instead of task details. File: src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx.
Added an At work-only “Завершено” placeholder button at the bottom of the info card (src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx) to surface the completion control even before it’s wired up.

Added a “Добавить” flow in src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx: documents list now shows orders with download/delete icons, includes an Add button, opens a type-selection dialog (order for now), shows an order form with drag-and-drop upload, and surfaces a 3s MUI alert on success/error. Wired order upload/delete logic to PATCH/DELETE /api/tasks/[id], updating task metadata immediately and handling confirmation messages dynamically. Updated src/app/api/tasks/[id]/route.ts so order files upload to taskId-documents, old order files/links are cleaned up, order URLs get stored in documents, and responses return normalized attachments/documents; deletes now also pull the order link from documents/attachments.
fix build app error
fix build app error#2
fix build app error#3
fix build app error#4
fix build app error#5
Added a multi-select for related tasks with async search, debounced lookups, and selection prefill in src/app/workspace/components/WorkspaceTaskDialog.tsx
Added relatedTasks to the local Task type in src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx

Populated and normalized relatedTasks data all the way through the APIs and UI so both task-detail views show actual related-task metadata, and the workspace dialog now understands those normalized references.

Replaced the inline list of related tasks on the protected task page with an Accordion that sits directly below the info card and stays open by default, and dropped the priority chips so only status badges remain (src/app/org/ (protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx
Added normalizeRelatedTasks/relatedTasksSync helpers so we can treat related-task refs consistently and mutate the inverse relations (src/app/utils/relatedTasks.ts, src/app/utils/relatedTasksSync.ts)
fix build app error
src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx:Заказ / договор card was removed entirely so contractors can’t view sensitive order/contract data
src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx:блок "Звязанные задачи" размещен после блока "Информация"

src/app/tasks/[id]/page.tsx:блок "Звязанные задачи" размещен после блока "Информация". src/app/tasks/[id]/page и src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx не рендерят Описание и Вложения,если нет данных
src/app/tasks/[id]/page и src/app/org/(protected)/[org]/projects/[project]/tasks/[id]/page.tsx блок "заказ/договор" после блока "документы"
Updated the project task table’s
Added a Заказ column to the project task table header so users can toggle visibility just like the other columns (src/app/workspace/components/ProjectTaskList.tsx
fix build app error
